text: ‘Deɛ Asafo Awurade, Israel Onyankopɔn no seɛ nie, Fa saa adetɔ so nwoma yi, deɛ wɔasɔ ano ne deɛ wɔnnsɔɔ ano, na fa gu dɔteɛ asuhina mu, sɛdeɛ ɛbɛkyɛre yie.32.14 fa to asuhina mu sɛdeɛ ɛbɛkyɛre yie—Krataa a wɔhunuu no asuhina mu wɔ Ɛlefantin ne Kumram (nkuro a ɛdeda Nkyene Po atɔeɛ fam) no dii mfeɛ 2,000 ne akyire a ɛho anka.
